name: Battle Bond
short-desc: Transforms this Pokemon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.
long-desc: Transforms this Pokemon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.  This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Greninja.
